channel.title: Need help DELTA
channel.description: Okay well im sick and tired of players being able to click as fast as they want on a skilling object and gaining exp how do i add like a actiontimer for a delta server?

like for fishing because its an npc how do i fix that?

item.title: Need help DELTA
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

I’m gonna tell you you should use System.currentTimeMillis method for your timer because it’s better than processing a timer but you most likely don’t know what that is (which isn’t an insult.) Try looking into how they work. Your server source probably already uses it somewhere.

Read full topic
